comment.author: Allycia
comment.text: CNN if you noticed did their froze and shut off the sound when DJT was rebutting Hillary. Also Anderson Cooper tells the audience to stop cheering for DJT but says nothing when cheer for Hillary. Women are waiting for Bill to apologize - Mrs Clinton, you condone Bill for his disgusting acts against women. I rather have locker room trash talk vs. 4 dead Americans in Benghazi. Still waiting for you show sympathy for those men and their family. By the way Hillary-I'm an educated woman and I've already voted for Trump/Pence.

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Anderson cooper is a cock sucker. Effin fag. Off coarse he's going to supper hillary
